revised_title: Viscoelastic Properties of Low-Molecular-Mass Polystyrene Melts
tldr: The authors conducted a study on the viscoelastic properties of low-molecular-mass polystyrene melts. They found that the equilibrium compliance of these materials is proportional to their molecular mass, and the steady-flow viscosity follows a modified free volume equation. The results provide insights into the behavior of polymers and their applications in various industries.
